scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:dist: rimraf dist && shx mkdir -p dist/public && shx cp -r client/dist/* dist/public/ && shx cp server/*.js server/package.json server/start.* server/stop.* dist/ && shx cp -r server/utils dist/ && shx cp server/.env* dist/ && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:dist
scripts.package: npm run build && rimraf release.zip && jszip -r release.zip dist/
scripts.start: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.start:dist: cd dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
